scripts.test_CreateProjectwithTask: artillery run --output results/report_CreateProjectwithTask.json CreateProjectwithTask.yml && artillery report --output results/report_CreateProjectwithTask.html results/report_CreateProjectwithTask.json
scripts.test_CreateTasks: artillery run --output results/report_CreateTasks.json CreateTasks.yml && artillery report --output results/report_CreateTasks.html results/report_CreateTasks.json
scripts.test_CreateTaskUsingFakers: artillery run --output results/report_UsingFakers.json CreateTaskUsingFakers.yml && artillery report --output results/report_UsingFakers.html results/report_UsingFakers.json
